name: market for terrain chipper on forwarder | terrain chipper on forwarder | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/11711/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'terrain chipper on forwarder', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;This is a mobile infrastructure, representing the product of a terrain chipper on forwarder, a heavy  vehicle used in forestry. It has a lifetime of 10 year and lifetime capacity 17,600 hour. The process includes all input materials, their end-of-life and the energy required for the production and maintenance of the forest machinery.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'terrain chipper on forwarder',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of 'terrain chipper on forwarder',  to the consumers of this product. Transport is included. Product losses during transportation are assumed negligible and are therefore not included.
category: C:Manufacturing/28:Manufacture of machinery and equipment n.e.c./282:Manufacture of special-purpose machinery/2821:Manufacture of agricultural and forestry machinery
